languages.text: {n}Арбитес и его пес провожают Высокого Фактотума тяжелыми взглядами, а затем оборачиваются на вас.{/n} "Еще кое-что, Вольный Торговец. Вы достойно проявили себя на "Бессердечном". В качестве дополнительной благодарности от Адептус Арбитес я беру на себя обязанности по вашей охране. По крайней мере, пока вы не прибудете на Даргонус. Там нас ждет мой маршал. У него к вам дело, а мне предстоит написать гору отчетов по этой операции".

{n}The Arbitrator and his dog both watch as Janris leaves, then turn to you.{/n} "There is one more thing, Rogue Trader. Your performance aboard the Heartless was highly appreciated. As an additional token of gratitude from the Adeptus Arbites, I will be joining your personal security detail, at least until we arrive on Dargonus to meet with the Marshal. He has business to discuss with you, and I have a mountain of reports to write up about this operation."
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитес и его пес провожают Высокого Фактотума тяжелыми взглядами, а затем оборачиваются на вас.{/n} "Еще кое-что, Вольный Торговец. Вы достойно проявили себя на "Бессердечном". В качестве дополнительной благодарности от Адептус Арбитес я беру на себя обязанности по вашей охране. По крайней мере, пока вы не прибудете на Даргонус. Там нас ждет мой маршал. У него к вам дело, а мне предстоит написать гору отчетов по этой операции".

He has business to discuss with you, and I have a mountain of reports to write up about this operation."

As an additional token of gratitude from the Adeptus Arbites, I will be joining your personal security detail, at least until we arrive on Dargonus to meet with the Marshal. He has business to discuss with you, and I have a mountain of reports to write up about this operation."

languages.text: {n}El Arbitrator y su perro observan a Janris marcharse y después se giran hacia ti.{/n} «Una cosa más, Comerciante: agradecemos profundamente su actuación a bordo de la Desalmada. Como muestra de gratitud adicional del Adeptus Arbites, me uniré a su guardia personal, al menos hasta que lleguemos a Dargonus para reunirnos con el Mariscal. Tiene asuntos que hablar con usted, y yo tengo un centenar de informes que redactar sobre la operación».
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator and his dog both watch as Janris leaves, then turn to you.{/n} "There is one more thing, Rogue Trader. Your performance aboard the Heartless was highly appreciated. As an additional token of gratitude from the Adeptus Arbites, I will be joining your personal security detail, at least until we arrive on Dargonus to meet with the Marshal. He has business to discuss with you, and I have a mountain of reports to write up about this operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arbitrator y su perro observan a Janris marcharse y después se giran hacia ti.{/n} «Una cosa más, Comerciante: agradecemos profundamente su actuación a bordo de la Desalmada. Como muestra de gratitud adicional del Adeptus Arbites, me uniré a su guardia personal, al menos hasta que lleguemos a Dargonus para reunirnos con el Mariscal. Tiene asuntos que hablar con usted, y yo tengo un centenar de informes que redactar sobre la operación».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙和他的狗目送詹里斯离开，随后，他将目光转向你。{/n}“还有一件事情，行商浪人。你在无心号上的表现非常值得赞赏。作为法务部的额外谢礼，我将会加入你的私人安保队伍。至少，在我们抵达达戈努斯，与元帅会面之前，我都会负责保护你的安全。他有事情要和你商谈，而我有一大堆关于这次行动的报告要写。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator and his dog both watch as Janris leaves, then turn to you.{/n} "There is one more thing, Rogue Trader. Your performance aboard the Heartless was highly appreciated. As an additional token of gratitude from the Adeptus Arbites, I will be joining your personal security detail, at least until we arrive on Dargonus to meet with the Marshal. He has business to discuss with you, and I have a mountain of reports to write up about this operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙和他的狗目送詹里斯离开，随后，他将目光转向你。{/n}“还有一件事情，行商浪人。你在无心号上的表现非常值得赞赏。作为法务部的额外谢礼，我将会加入你的私人安保队伍。至少，在我们抵达达戈努斯，与元帅会面之前，我都会负责保护你的安全。他有事情要和你商谈，而我有一大堆关于这次行动的报告要写。”

languages.text: {n}L'arbitrator et son chien regardent Janris s'éloigner avant de se tourner vers vous.{/n} « Une dernière chose, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Votre intervention à bord du Sans-Cœur nous a été d'une aide précieuse. En gage de reconnaissance supplémentaire de la part de l'Adeptus Arbites, je vais intégrer votre garde rapprochée, au moins le temps que nous accostions à Dargonus pour rencontrer le maréchal. Pendant que vous parlerez affaires, je m'attellerai à la montagne de rapports qu'il me faut rédiger à propos de cette opération. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator and his dog both watch as Janris leaves, then turn to you.{/n} "There is one more thing, Rogue Trader. Your performance aboard the Heartless was highly appreciated. As an additional token of gratitude from the Adeptus Arbites, I will be joining your personal security detail, at least until we arrive on Dargonus to meet with the Marshal. He has business to discuss with you, and I have a mountain of reports to write up about this operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'arbitrator et son chien regardent Janris s'éloigner avant de se tourner vers vous.{/n} « Une dernière chose, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Votre intervention à bord du Sans-Cœur nous a été d'une aide précieuse. En gage de reconnaissance supplémentaire de la part de l'Adeptus Arbites, je vais intégrer votre garde rapprochée, au moins le temps que nous accostions à Dargonus pour rencontrer le maréchal. Pendant que vous parlerez affaires, je m'attellerai à la montagne de rapports qu'il me faut rédiger à propos de cette opération. »

languages.text: {n}アービトレイターと彼の犬の両方がジャンリスが去るのを見て、あなたの方を向く。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、もう一つあります。ハートレスでのあなたの活躍は非常に感謝しています。アデプトゥス・アルビテスからのさらなる感謝の印として、少なくともダルゴナスに着いて将帥に会うまで、私はあなたの個人的な護衛に加わります。彼にはあなたと話すことがあり、私には今回の作戦について書き上げなければならない山のような報告書があります」
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator and his dog both watch as Janris leaves, then turn to you.{/n} "There is one more thing, Rogue Trader. Your performance aboard the Heartless was highly appreciated. As an additional token of gratitude from the Adeptus Arbites, I will be joining your personal security detail, at least until we arrive on Dargonus to meet with the Marshal. He has business to discuss with you, and I have a mountain of reports to write up about this operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}アービトレイターと彼の犬の両方がジャンリスが去るのを見て、あなたの方を向く。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、もう一つあります。ハートレスでのあなたの活躍は非常に感謝しています。アデプトゥス・アルビテスからのさらなる感謝の印として、少なくともダルゴナスに着いて将帥に会うまで、私はあなたの個人的な護衛に加わります。彼にはあなたと話すことがあり、私には今回の作戦について書き上げなければならない山のような報告書があります」

languages.text: {n}Yargıcı ve köpeği, Janris'in gidişini izleyip sonrasında sana dönüyor.{/n} "Bir şey daha var Hür Tacir. Taşkalp'teki performansın fazlasıyla takdire şayandı. Adeptus Arbites'ten ilave bir minnet göstergesi olarak Dargonus'a varıp Miralay'la görüşene değin şahsi koruma biriminize dâhil olacağım. Sizinle konuşması gereken şeyler varmış, benim de bu harekâta dair yazmam gereken yığınla rapor var."
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator and his dog both watch as Janris leaves, then turn to you.{/n} "There is one more thing, Rogue Trader. Your performance aboard the Heartless was highly appreciated. As an additional token of gratitude from the Adeptus Arbites, I will be joining your personal security detail, at least until we arrive on Dargonus to meet with the Marshal. He has business to discuss with you, and I have a mountain of reports to write up about this operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yargıcı ve köpeği, Janris'in gidişini izleyip sonrasında sana dönüyor.{/n} "Bir şey daha var Hür Tacir. Taşkalp'teki performansın fazlasıyla takdire şayandı. Adeptus Arbites'ten ilave bir minnet göstergesi olarak Dargonus'a varıp Miralay'la görüşene değin şahsi koruma biriminize dâhil olacağım. Sizinle konuşması gereken şeyler varmış, benim de bu harekâta dair yazmam gereken yığınla rapor var."

languages.text: {n}Der Arbitrator und sein Hund blicken Janris nach, ehe sie sich wieder dir zuwenden.{/n} "Da wäre noch eine Sache, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr habt auf der Heartless eine herausragende Leistung gezeigt. Als zusätzliches Zeichen des Dankes seitens des Adeptus Arbites werde ich mich Eurer persönlichen Garde anschließen ... jedenfalls bis wir uns auf Dargonus mit dem Marschall treffen. Er möchte etwas Geschäftliches mit Euch besprechen, und ich muss haufenweise Berichte über diese Operation schreiben."
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator and his dog both watch as Janris leaves, then turn to you.{/n} "There is one more thing, Rogue Trader. Your performance aboard the Heartless was highly appreciated. As an additional token of gratitude from the Adeptus Arbites, I will be joining your personal security detail, at least until we arrive on Dargonus to meet with the Marshal. He has business to discuss with you, and I have a mountain of reports to write up about this operation."

Er möchte etwas Geschäftliches mit Euch besprechen, und ich muss haufenweise Berichte über diese Operation schreiben."
